headline.main: Backstrom Scores in OT as Capitals Beat Flyers
headline.print_headline: Backstrom Scores in OT as Capitals Beat Flyers

lead_paragraph: The Capitals and Flyers tried to pummel each other out of the gate Saturday night, then Washington settled things on special teams.
snippet: The Capitals and Flyers tried to pummel each other out of the gate Saturday night, then Washington settled things on special teams....
